titleStmt.title: Palinodia. Sive Fama vapulans occasioned by her retractation of her precipitate censure of Mrs. Anne Gibbs, by her real convert and re-admirer, R.W.
titleStmt.author: Walden, Richard.

notesStmt.note: The first word on the title page is Greek.

Madan --- "The two pieces next above seem to be one octavo sheet. The former (Wing W289) is a sorrowful complaint that mrs. Gibbs was no better than she should be, and the latter (Wing 288) a palinode confessing that the writer was mistaken in accusing the actress, who is now restored to favour.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Anne Gibbs = Anne Shadwell, wife of Thomas Shadwell.
